title: Patchwork, 1925–1928
description: Curved and rectangular, irregularly shaped pieces of felt, the smaller pieces in the center, in a wide range of brilliant colors with some brown, black and gray, sewn together in a large hanging, showing an abstracted image of a man in profile. Border of rectangle in various colored felt pieces. Signature "Fillia" in lower left corner in black thread stem stitch. In lower right corner "S.I.R.E." in yellow stem stitch.
